error.message: The page you were looking for may have moved or you may have been redirected here by mistake.

help.bugs: At this time I don't have an official bug tracker to submit to. Sorry! This entry ~will~ be updated accordingly when it's available.
help.requests: Please do not send me translation requests. I'm only a software developer and not qualified as a translator.
help.requestsTitle: Can you help me with something?
help.whatIsThisSite: I built this website to be a collection of Japanese translation tools I hope will be of use to others as it is for me. Please enjoy.
help.suggestions: At this time I'm not accepting feature requests as I already have a lot planned. When that changes I will update this entry with more information. Sorry!
help.suggestionsTitle: I have a suggestion for the website!

kanjiInfo.error400: Error 400: Bad Request to backend (try refreshing the page?)
kanjiInfo.error404: Error 404: Entry not found (some kanji may be incomplete, please check the external links instead)

multi.instructions: Click a radical to get started, kanji composed of selected radicals will appear on the right

settings.themeDesc: Changes the display theme (requires refresh for now)
